block.p: Mr. and Mrs. John H. Gavin of Rumson, N.J., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Elizabeth Anne Gavin, to David Andrew Scott, a son of Anne Scott of Point Pleasant, N.J., and the late Jack H. Scott. A June wedding is planned.

Miss Gavin, 25, is a marketing coordinator in the corporate division at Tiffany & Company in New York. She graduated from Rosemont College. Her father is a quality manager at the American Telephone and Telegraph Company in Basking Ridge, N.J. Her mother, Suzanne E. Gavin, is a kindergarten teacher at the Deane-Porter School in Rumson.

Mr. and Mrs. John H. Gavin of Rumson, N.J., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Elizabeth Anne Gavin, to David Andrew Scott, a son of Anne Scott of Point Pleasant, N.J., and the late Jack H. Scott. A June wedding is planned.

Miss Gavin, 25, is a marketing coordinator in the corporate division at Tiffany & Company in New York. She graduated from Rosemont College. Her father is a quality manager at the American Telephone and Telegraph Company in Basking Ridge, N.J. Her mother, Suzanne E. Gavin, is a kindergarten teacher at the Deane-Porter School in Rumson.

Mr. Scott, 28, is an assistant regional underwriting manager at National Union Fire Insurance Company in New York. He graduated from Lafayette College. His father was a stockbroker at Beare & Moynahan Inc., a former brokerage house in Spring Lake, N.J.
